about_the_game:
Embark on the ultimate intergalactic adventure!

Crash-landed on a mysterious tropical island, you find yourself in the heart of Lost World—a place teeming with secrets, challenges, and hidden treasures. Your mission? To uncover the Loops that will unlock the gateway to the Space HUB, a vast interdimensional nexus connecting a lot of worlds—each with its own unique theme, challenges, and lore.

A quest for the legendary Golden Loop

In eWorlds, every step you take is part of an epic quest to find the legendary Golden Loop. But this journey isn’t for the faint of heart: each world you explore brings its own set of puzzles to solve, traps to dodge, and mysteries to unravel. Whether you’re racing against the clock in thrilling time trials or simply soaking in the diverse landscapes, every moment is packed with excitement.

Collectathon enthusiasts, rejoice! eWorlds is a love letter to the classic platformers that captivated our hearts. As you delve into each world, you'll find exciting new ways to interact with the environment, revealing hidden paths and secrets that were once out of reach.

Power-ups: your key to mastering

Equip powerful Power-Ups to tackle the game’s challenges! Smash through barriers with the Hammer, soar through the skies with the Umbrella, or use the Grappling Hook to navigate treacherous terrain. These Power-Ups aren’t just upgrades—they’re essential tools for overcoming obstacles and discovering every Loop.

Share the adventure

But the adventure doesn’t have to be a solo one. eWorlds lets you share the journey with friends in cooperative play. Team up to tackle the multiverse’s toughest challenges, strategize to collect every Loop, and uncover secrets that might just be impossible to find on your own.

Customize your journey

As you traverse these worlds, don’t forget to collect coins scattered throughout your journey. These coins can be spent in the in-game store, where you’ll find an array of skins to customize your character. Mix and match to create a look that’s uniquely yours, and show off your style as you explore the multiverse!

What awaits you in eWorlds:

  • Collectathon glory:: Gather Loops in each world and unlock the path to the ultimate prize—the legendary Golden Loop.

  • Diverse worlds: From the tropical mysteries of Lost World to the futuristic landscapes of Alienware Station, each world is distinct and packed with surprises.

  • Time trials & Challenges: Push your skills to the limit in thrilling time trials and face a variety of challenges designed to test your wits and reflexes.

  • Power-Ups: Discover and equip powerful items that give you new abilities, making you stronger and more versatile as you progress.

  • Cooperative play: Share the adventure with friends, combining your strengths to overcome the most formidable obstacles and unlock every secret.

  • Unlockable Worlds: Explore and conquer each world to unlock the next, uncovering the mysteries of the multiverse one Loop at a time.

  • Customization: Collect coins across different worlds and use them in the store to get a variety of skins. Mix and match to show off your unique style!



Important note:

We will only be providing support in English and Spanish, but we have automatically translated the game into other languages to enhance the experience for everyone (French, German, Portuguese, Polish, Russian, Korean, Chinese, Traditional Chinese and Japanese). However, please keep in mind that this is not a professional translation and may contain errors.

name: eWorlds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 de 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 fourth generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 o AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 de 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 sixth generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 o AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad, Headphones, Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: Get ready for an intergalactic adventure in eWorlds! After a crash, you’re stuck on a tropical island. Grab the Loops to unlock the Space HUB, which will open up exciting worlds. Solve puzzles, dodge traps, and uncover mysteries, solo or with friends. Are you up for the legendary Golden Loop quest?
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
